WorkItem.Description:
It'd be nice with a console runner for hooking Chirpy into the build server (not much reason to minify resources before deployment).

Only truly useful if it can also detect and replace resource links (css/js) in views.

Comments.Message: Awesome, will check it out this weekend.

Can't get the source code to compile. I get the following errors:

Error	4	'Yahoo.Yui.Compressor.JavaScriptCompressor' does not contain a constructor that takes 6 arguments  Zippy.Chirp
Error	7	Metadata file 'bin\TempChirpy.dll' could not be found	Zippy.Chirp.Tests

I am download changeset dd3c317c3aa0  and all build success.
What version "Yahoo.Yui.Compressor" you have ?
